title: New: Grimes – Genesis
content:
‘Oblivion’ had some pretty large feet, it therefore stands to reason that the track that followed it would have some pretty huge shoes to fill.

Thankfully, the follow up to what was many people’s track of the year is chilling snug as a bug in Grimes’ big black boots. It could even be argued that the new track ‘Genesis’ is splitting the boots at the fucking seams, or perhaps this overused analogy has gone on for too long; it seemed clever at the time.

I won’t bore you with my thoughts, after all everyone and their grandma have posted it over the last 24 hours. What I will say however, is that it’s been on repeat from the moment I heard it.

Visions drops on 02/21 via 4AD in the States and UK, and Arbutus in Canada.

Grimes – Genesis
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
